snippet.title: Adani railway should be Aus built: Hanson
snippet.content: Pauline Hanson wants a railway between Adani's mega-coal mine and the Queensland coast to be built and owned by the state or federal government. The One Nation leader told ABC Radio on Thursday the infrastructure could generate $1 billion a year in revenue, so it shouldn't be given to "foreign investors to own and control". She also claimed she had been informed the Indian company planned to sell a minority stake in the controversial Galilee Basin project in the next "couple of years". Originally published as
